title: Steve Ballmer: Microsoft will give Apple a good run for their money, nobody else is trying
text:
Steve Ballmer: Microsoft will give Apple a good run for their money, nobody else is trying 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Steve Ballmer, in a wide-ranging interview said that it is only Microsoft which is going after the Mac and the iPad. He further noted that n...
